      • getFlagValue

        public boolean getFlagValue(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                   java.lang.String flag,
                   ShieldRegion region)
                     throws FlagNotFoundException,
                            InvalidFlagException,
                            InvalidRegionException
        Description copied from interface: ShieldAPI
        Checks the value of a flag for a specific Player.

        If the flag's Player list contains the player passed in, then this will return the flag's value. If not, it will return the opposite of the flags value.

        Specified by:
        getFlagValue in interface ShieldAPI
        Parameters:
        player - - player
        flag - - flag name, String
        region - - ShieldRegion
        Returns:
        Boolean
        Throws:
        FlagNotFoundException
        InvalidFlagException
        InvalidRegionException
